statements: SELECT * FROM order_routing_rules
SELECT symbol, order_type FROM order_routing_rules WHERE rule_id = 1
SELECT * FROM order_routing_rules WHERE symbol = 'AAPL'
SELECT * FROM order_routing_rules WHERE order_type = 'BUY' ORDER BY rule_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT execution_strategy FROM order_routing_rules
SELECT * FROM order_routing_rules WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND order_type = 'Market' AND execution_strategy = 'Default'
SELECT rule_id, symbol, order_type FROM order_routing_rules WHERE symbol = 'GOOG' ORDER BY rule_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT symbol FROM order_routing_rules WHERE order_type IN ('Limit', 'Stop')
SELECT * FROM order_routing_rules ORDER BY symbol ASC, rule_id DESC
SELECT AVG(rule_id) AS average_rule_id FROM order_routing_rules
SELECT * FROM order_routing_rules;
SELECT id, rule_name FROM order_routing_rules WHERE route_priority > 5;
SELECT symbol, route_destination FROM order_routing_rules ORDER BY route_priority DESC;
SELECT * FROM execution_strategies WHERE id=1;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM execution_strategies;
SELECT * FROM order_routing_rules WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY rule_name ASC;
SELECT id, rule_name, route_destination FROM order_routing_rules WHERE route_priority > 5;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM execution_strategies WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM order_routing_rules WHERE route_priority BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT * FROM order_routing_rules WHERE symbol LIKE 'MS%' ORDER BY route_destination DESC;
SELECT * FROM order_routing_rules;
SELECT rule_name, execution_strategy FROM order_routing_rules;
SELECT route_priority, rule_name FROM order_routing_rules ORDER BY route_priority DESC;
SELECT * FROM algorithmic_strategies;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM algorithmic_strategies;
SELECT * FROM order_routing_rules;
SELECT rule_name, execution_strategy FROM order_routing_rules ORDER BY rule_id DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM algorithmic_strategies WHERE strategy_id < 5;
SELECT instruction_id, rule_id, instruction_details FROM routing_instructions WHERE strategy_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM routing_instructions WHERE instruction_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM strategies ORDER BY strategy_id DESC;
SELECT rule_name, order_type FROM order_routing_rules WHERE strategy_id = 3;
SELECT instruction_name, instruction_text FROM execution_instructions WHERE strategy_id = 1 ORDER BY instruction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM order_types WHERE order_type_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT rule_name, rule_id, condition FROM order_routing_rules WHERE strategy_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM order_routing_rules WHERE rule_id = 1;
SELECT rule_name, order_type FROM order_routing_rules WHERE strategy_id = 5;
SELECT strategy_name FROM strategies WHERE strategy_description IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM execution_instructions WHERE instruction_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT order_type_name, order_type_description FROM order_types WHERE order_type_id > 2;
SELECT * FROM order_routing_rules;
SELECT rule_id, symbol, order_type FROM order_routing_rules WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT rule_id, symbol, order_type, quantity FROM order_routing_rules ORDER BY symbol ASC;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, description FROM execution_strategies WHERE LENGTH(description) > 0;
SELECT instruction_id, rule_id, strategy_id, order_priority FROM routing_instructions WHERE order_priority < 5;
SELECT * FROM execution_strategies;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM execution_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 3;
SELECT symbol, quantity FROM order_routing_rules WHERE order_type = 'BUY' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT instruction_id, order_priority FROM routing_instructions WHERE strategy_id = 2 AND order_priority > 3;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_role_mapping JOIN user_roles ON user_role_mapping.role_id = user_roles.role_id WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
